Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Slush Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.
1 Vital Spirit 5 The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.
18 Steadfast 2 The Pokémon's determination boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches.
36 Inner Focus 3 The Pokémon's intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.
54 Scrappy 6 The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
72 Stakeout 6 Doubles the damage dealt to the target's replacement if the target switches out.
90 Long Reach 4 The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.
100 Technician 8 Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 02 Pickup 2 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
Disc 03 Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
Disc 06 Keen Eye 1 Prevents other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon's accuracy.
Disc 13 Cloud Nine 6 Eliminates the effects of weather.
Disc 24 Levitate 8 By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
Disc 25 Super Luck 5 The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
Disc 31 Technician 8 Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
Disc 46 Flare Boost 6 Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is burned.
Disc 50 Damp 2 Prevents the use of explosive moves, such as Self-Destruct, by dampening its surroundings.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Air Lock 8 Eliminates the effects of weather.
Big Pecks 2 Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.
Combatize 8 Normal-type moves become Fighting-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Costar 4 When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.
Dancer 6 When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it immediately does so regardless of its Speed.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Defiant 8 Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.
Early Bird 4 The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.
Frisk 5 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.
Gale Wings 7 Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is full.
Gorilla Tactics 5 Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.
Guts 6 It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.
Hustle 7 Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
Hyper Cutter 2 The Pokémon's pride of its pincers prevents other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
Inflexible -3 This Pokémon can only use the first move it uses in battle.
Inner Focus 3 The Pokémon's intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.
Intimidate 7 The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entry, lowering their Attack stat.
Justified 4 Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack stat of the Pokémon, for justice.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Limber 4 Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
Long Reach 4 The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.
Menace 7 The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entry, lowering their Sp. Atk stat.
Opportunist 7 Copies opponent positive stat changes.
Overcoat 7 Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.
Paper Skin -4 Halves the Pokémon's Sp. Def stat.
Predictable -6 This Pokémon's predictable maneuvers make moves hit against it without fail.
Quick Feet 6 Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.
Refrigerate 8 Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Rivalry 3 Deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less to those of the opposite gender.
Scrappy 6 The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
Serene Grace 9 Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring when attacking.
Sharpness 5 Boosts the power of slicing moves.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Slush Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.
Snow Cloak 6 Boosts evasiveness in a hailstorm.
Speed Boost 9 Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.
Stakeout 6 Doubles the damage dealt to the target's replacement if the target switches out.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Stalwart 2 Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.
Steadfast 2 The Pokémon's determination boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches.
Swift Swim 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain.
Toxic Boost 6 Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon is poisoned.
Unburden 8 Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is used or lost.
Victory Star 6 Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
Vital Spirit 5 The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.
Wind Power 1 When hit by a wind move, the {POKEMON} becomes Charged up.
Wind Rider 5 Blocks wind moves. Attack is boosted from Tailwind or when hit by a wind move.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
